improvements: Add referenced reasons why the topic is relevant
Link to other related Wikipedia pages inside the content part
Any additional material can help raise the quality

criteria: Usable amount of content, but still not enough
Has enough sources to be verifiable
Has more than one reliable source
improvements: Add some supporting materials, such as images or diagrams
Add an Infobox if there is none
Check for uncited content and add references
Check if all inline citations are referenced and from reliable sources
Add more images, videos or audio if possible
Add some links with relevant websites with a short description

criteria: Has been reviewed by at least one reviewer
Is verifiable with no original research
Is stable, meaning the article doesn't change that much anymore
improvements: Compare this article with a similar article that has the grade FA, this may help to see what is still lacking

criteria: Had to pass an in-depth examination by reviewers
Has a lot of important content
Includes images and other media that have captions and have a acceptable copyright status
improvements: No additions are necessary unless there is new information
